import "./about.css"; import Engineer from "../../img/Engineer.jpg" const About = () => { return (

About Me

I am a fresh graduate from the Islamic University of Technology. I have successfully completed my Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering under the Department of Computer Science and Engineering. Being a graduate student with four years of research, project, and academic study at an international university I have developed a strong interest in CyberSecurity, Data Science, Software Development, and Software Testing.

In the early years of my bachelor's life, I was introduced to android app development. My interest in app development started from that point. With growing interest, I worked on two Android apps which provide solutions to some major daily issues in our life such as improving food security and livelihood, and then online second-hand bookselling and buying. After app development, I learned web application development. I made some web applications using Reactjs such as an E-commerce website where we can buy our day-to-day necessary products. Then as a part of my curriculum, I learned the agile software development process, Software verification, and validation, software maintenance, Software testing, etc, and practiced them in the lab

After working with various software architectures I have developed my interest in microservices architecture. Therefore in my professional endeavor, I completed my Internship at KloverCloud BD Ltd. where they use a microservices architecture and provide the customer with PAAS service. During my internship, I got to work with Backend development, Software testing, and Technical report writing. I learned a lot from them which helped me to understand a lot about professional life.

During my 1st undergrad research, I worked on the enhancement of different low-light images using Histogram Equalization (HE) and Illumination Adjustment. I enjoyed a lot working on digital image processing and want to learn and work on it more with data science in the future. However, for my undergrad thesis, I desired to get involved with CyberSecurity. I came to realize that the websites of our nation's educational institutions are extremely vulnerable to many deadly assaults that may lead to data theft, data manipulation, etc. As a result, We scanned Bangladeshi educational institutional websites using two scanning tools the analyzed the report and case to conclude that the websites are a lot vulnerable. In this process, we also compared the performance of the tools .This research motivated me for further study o automated vulnerability detection and attack prevention on different platforms.

); }; export default About;
